headline: ‘Look Beyond AI’: JPMorgan Says These 2 Hardware Stocks Are Worth Watching in 2025
summary: With New Year just around the corner, it’s high time to get the ol’ portfolio in order. While it might be somewhat arbitrary to choose this time to sort through stocks and find the best picks for the next year, it is wise to do so periodically – and the change on the calendar is as good a time as any. The equity research teams at JPMorgan are getting ready for next year by sifting through the markets to find stocks worth watching in 2025. They’re looking by category – and in the tech world, they
